profile.title: Software Developer
profileDescription: I am a seasoned graphic designer with over 14 years of experience in creating visually appealing and user-centric designs. My expertisespans across UI design, design systems, and custom illustrations,helping clients bring their digital visions to life.

Currently, I work remotely for Notion, where I design template UIs, convert them into HTML and CSS, and provide comprehensive support to our users. I am passionate about crafting elegant and functional designs that enhance user experiences.
